name: ZomKeys
description:
!!! Warning I highly recommend you play in windowed mode !!!

if it's lagging for you you can try downloading the game using the drive link

sorry due to some last-minute issues I couldn't upload the file before the jam I hope ill fix these bugs as the game jam voting ends.

If you want to play Lag free on windows - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1v1EtXkC7vyoix28CvphYoDHWc27PufhT/view?usp=shari...

THIS GAME IS JUST TO HAVE FUN WITH THE MECHANICS AND NOT ABOUT THE GAME DESIGN 

Made an FPS shooter for the brackeys 2023 game-jam, 

The game is pretty simple and straightforward, just collect the Brakeys to complete the objective 

the story goes like this, You (The player) have to save the world which is about to an end due to zombie apocalypse, which connects to the theme (an end is a new beginning)

Controls 

WASD for movement

Space to jump 

Left Mouse to shoot 

R to reload

headshots get you a  direct kill.
